quoteText:
21. Binding Individual Arbitration

This section provides details about how we will resolve disputes through the arbitration process.

You and Square agree to arbitrate any and all Disputes by a neutral arbitrator who has the power to award the same individual damages and individual relief that a court can.
title: This service forces users into binding arbitration in the case of disputes

tosdr.case: This service forces users into binding arbitration in the case of disputes
